description:
The entire west side of the room is occupied by a large four foot tall bar.
The west wall is lined with doorless shelves containing all manner of
bottles and trinkets. The remaining floor space is covered with a variety of
tables and chairs. No two tables appear to be the same, however the chairs
all appear to be crafted the same. Many paintings line the walls along with
hooks for hanging cloaks and other gear. Spaced evenly around each wall are
iron brackets, each holding a torch to light the room.
name: William the Braves Tavern
